show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: The Endgame
content:
Sadly, we must accept being at a point that, frankly we had arrived at a while back. <!--more--> I held off announcing it because I did want to rest assured that I was giving serious and well-considered information.
World War 3 is now, for me, a certainty.
There is no going back.
I explain why this is so in today’s show with a heavy heart and with a full understanding of the responsibility my words carry, given my following on the Wake-Up Call.
The European economy has finally infected Germany whose growth is slowing alarmingly.
None of the measures taken by Europe are in any way relevant to the problems of Europe.
Some detail on why the housing crisis is by no means over.
Indeed, it is coming back with a vengeance.
Voters are clearly dissatisfied with the economy and it showed in the polls.
But the evidence points to much worse conditions ahead.
Absolutely no difference to be expected regardless of who sits in Congress.
A kind listener chimes in with her ‘questions’.
Ignore the pundits’ optimism over the economy.
Just ignore it.
A 90-year-old man faces jail for feeding the homeless in Fort Lauderdale.
